lines.text:
[His last lines]
I don't see anything... wait a minute...
[On seeing the creature]
Holy shit... I DON'T FUCKING BELIEVE IT... LOOK AT THE FUCKING SIZE OF THAT THING OH MY GOD... GOD

[His last lines]
Shut up and get the hell out of here... GET THE HELL OUT OF HERE

[Going over a checklist]
Umbilicals?
Clear.
Check.
Henweigh?
Henweigh ready.
Wait, wait, wait, uh, what's a "henweigh?"
Oh, about three to four pounds.

[the others laugh]
Very funny, assholes!
Eat this, you big sack of fish shit!
Okay, boys and girls, don't try this at home.
It'll go supercritical soon.
What happens when it goes supercritical?
It'll explode.
Welcome to ground zero.
Well, at least Snyder will get his name in the Guinness book of records. I mean, causing two nuclear explosions in one afternoon has to be some sort of record.
I did everything by the book, I followed my orders.
Get my kit.
I'm going to kill that son of a bitch Snyder.
He's already dead.
The US Navy. It's not just a job, it's an adventure!

[while encoutering the beast]
Look at that mother
Get out of here save yourselves
These cartridges expired six months ago!
